data.title: Service and hospitality  excellence
data.text: Clean efficient room.  No problems encountered.  Super friendly and helpful staff including breakfast staff.  I saved close to $300 booking here over traditional hotels.  So very please with that.  The breakfast taff even made and delivered  waffles  to our table, never had that happen beore.

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking your time to write a review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We are glad you were happy with your service from our staff and the value of our property. We hope you will stay with us again on your next trip to Fort Myers. Thank you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Our wedding reception
data.text: We arrived very early before check in time. The hotel staff worked diligently to ready outr rooms. The accommodations were very nice and clean. A water front hotel that couldn't be compared to anything in down town fort Myers. Everything was above par!

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. We really enjoy our weeding groups. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and had a wonderful weekend. Thank you
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Updating sorely needed...
data.text:
I only stayed one night with hubby, so temper my review with that knowledge.  Clean room, nice waterfront view of marina and basic needs met.  Great location if you have a boat docked.  A bit far to walk regarding the "tourist" areas for me, but doable.  Had the King waterfront balcony.  Seemed to be a family run motel, and employees were very helpful and friendly.

Note to owners:  make an investment to update rooms and furniture.  Ratings would jump easily.

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are happy to hear of staff was able to accommodate you. Thank you for staying with Legacy Harbour!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hunk Dory Knows the way To Legacy
data.text: What a fine marina we have in Ft Myers. Great location, near the river district, great staff and facilities. Can't say enough about the services. 4th of July BBQ and fire works were to die for. Highly recommended, but make your reservation early. Eric and his staff aim to please.

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are happy to you enjoyed your stay  at our hotel and marina.  Thank you for joining us for our yearly 4th of July BBQ. Thank you for staying with Legacy Harbour!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unbeatable Location!
data.text:
The view of the river and marina from the balcony of our one bedroom and two bedroom suites was beautiful throughout the day and breathtaking at sunset. The suites have recently been renovated and they are much nicer than the pictures on Legacy's website.
No other hotel in the Fort Myers Historic River District is within walking distance of everything the River District has to offer.

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this great review. We are going to put some new pictures online soon. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice Stay.. Good Value
data.text: Stayed with friends for a night, we got a one bedroom suite which was enough for 4-6 persons, suite door was opening to the beed room directly then there was a corridor leading to the living and the kitchen which has a sofa bed and a nice balcony overlooking the Mexican gulf, good value for money for downtown Fort Myers

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Clean, but not cheap
data.text: We wanted to check out the marina and surrounding area before bringing our boat to the marina for an extended stay.  Although our room was more like a motel than a hotel, it was comfortable and clean.  The breakfast was good and the staff was friendly and helpful.  The larger rooms facing the river were likely more spacious.

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are glad you enjoyed the hotel and marina.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Beautiful view but average room...
data.text: The marina is nice and sunset over the river can't be beat. But the room is average. Mostly clean, with the exception of the ants that ate our pastries that we had brought with us. Bed is hard and there is no decor (pictures, mirror etc.) in the room leaving it to feel a little sterile. Pool area is tiny.

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We have made some changes over the summer to add to our rooms. We do have a very large deck that has just been redone this summer for our guest to lounge and enjoy the water view. Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place to stay
data.text: I really liked this place. First, the location is absolutely perfect. Many restaurants and bars near, you don't need a car or taxi to go to them. The hotel has good space on these rooms, and they have a lot of facilities (dryer, iron, etc). And they have a good breakfast. But the best thing for me was the staff. The front desk person called Kerry impressed me. He was very kind and helpful. This guy deserves a raise in his salary, he really makes the difference!

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this great review. Kerry was happy to hear he made a good impression for your stay with us. We are happy you enjoyed your stay! Thank you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Weekend Wedding
data.text:
Legacy Harbour is a perfect place to spend with family and friends. Our nephew and bride reserved the place for guests. The parents and wedding party had the bigger rooms that went out to a large deck. We all gathered after each event and socialised. 
It is walking distance to town, where an array of eating establishments are diverse and plentiful
The staff was so friendly and helpful. 
Rooms were clean and roomy. The typical room had just showers, while the other one and two bedrooms had tub/shower
Perfect place to return for visit

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We really enjoy our wedding groups. We are happy you enjoyed your stay!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Just so so.
data.text: The help was super nice and friendly. That is the best reason to stay. I killed a large cockroach and found a few hairs in the shower. The location was excellent. The patio was not big deal. Breakfast was so so.

data.title: Absolutely the best!
data.text: We were in town due to a family emergency.  The place is clean, comfortable and the staff very accommodating.  My brother, sister and I were so grateful for all the help they gave us.  We felt more like old friends than hotel guests.  Thank you Mark for everything.  I would not hesitate to recommend this wonderful hotel, unless they are booked and I WANT a room!

owner_response.author: LegacyHarbour, Manager at Legacy Harbour Hotel & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for writing and reviewing our property. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you and your family again soon. Well wishes.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Friendly staff
data.text: We stayed on night in a clean, quiet, and comfortable room.  It was a basic room, but we enjoyed the friendly staff and beautiful deck overlooking the Harbor.  They even allowed me to use a computer when my laptop wouldn't connect to the internet.  All in all a place I would choose again if in the area.

data.title: Friendly motel a short walk to historic downtown
data.text:
This is not a hotel but a classic drive-in motel, however situated a short convenient walk to the bar and restaurant scene in downtown Fort Myers. The quiet location fronts a marina. The staff is exceptionally friendly, although it seems understaffed at times, with notes at the door to the lobby and a telephone mounted outside the door. Pretty much a self-service motel. The rooms are clean but lack character or design. Beds are not very comfortable with short and lumpy mattresses and there are noisy aggressive thru-the-wall air conditioning units that blast cold dry air.
Standard coffee, packaged breads, cereal, yogurt and fresh fruit offered at self-serve breakfast buffet in the registration area.
Free WiFi. Good value.

data.title: Old but Adequate
data.text: We had a king room which by todays standards was small in comparison to other hotels we have stayed in.  The room was clean as was the bathroom which offered all the amenities such as shampoo, mouthwash, and etc.  The bed and pillows were comfortable.

data.title: Great place!
data.text: We stayed 2 nights at the Legacy this past week; one on Thursday and the other on Saturday.  We were greeted by Larry at the front desk who was so helpful in all aspects of our stay.  We really appreciated him going above and beyond to check on a possible room opening for Saturday night and leaving us a note that we were able to stay!  The rooms both nights were so clean and comfortable; yes, the bathroom is on the small side, but still all the needed amenities and then some (the mouthwash and make up cleansing cloths were a nice addition).  Love the patio view too!  The location is great to walk downtown to the restaurants and bars. We definitely will be staying again when we are in the area!

data.title: Great, quiet location at a reasonable price
data.text:
Everything one needs for a good nights rest. Exceptionally clean and comfortable. Close to downtown Ft. Myer's and walking distance to The Edison and Ford Winter Estates. A very good complimentary breakfast
and excellent service. We look forward to returning.

data.title: Great value inFt.Myers
data.text:
Small, two story motel on a marina in downtown Ft. Myers...this property has clearly been fully updated, spotlessly clean, has very comfy beds, free wifi and breakfast. Pool and deck area on premises...
Our room faced the parking lot, but we saw that rooms with a marina view could be booked as well...first floor rooms very accessible for folks with ambulatory  issues as parking is right by door....
Definitely a good value for the price...

data.title: Very good downtown Motel
data.text: Stayed one night while passing through Fort Myers on vacation.  While named a Hotel, its really a Motel located adjacent to the downtown area of Fort Myers.  There is a variety of restaurants and shopping facilities located within a few blocks. Easy walking distance to the harbor, and the area feels very safe to walk around in the evening.  Property looks like it has been recently updated.  Room was spacious and clean, and the bed was very comfortable.  Nothing upscale or fancy, but it has everything you would need for a short or long term stay.  Price is in line to other hotels in the area.  Would certainly stay again.

data.title: clean hotel room
data.text: really close to winter mansions and historic district--not really walking close but very easy to navigate.  free wi-fi and parking apparently a free trolley also passes the property but, we had no problem driving.  We stayed 2 nights
